name: Corporal Stone
description:
Corporal Stone is a text adventure in which the player takes the role of the aforementioned corporal who is some sort of secret agent/problem solver.

The game starts with Corporal Stone being summoned to a building complex downtown where he finds his ex partner dying, his last words were "They got me...Kill the little people....". Needless to say there's something afoot inside the Hexagon building where there have been reports of aliens, little wooden men and more.

This game was developed using The Quill. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well allowing the player to save a game position in memory.
